text: Corbières is the name of three places in Europe: * in France: ** Corbières, Aude, a commune in the Aude department ** Corbières-en-Provence, a commune in the Alpes-de-Haute-Provence department * in Switzerland: ** Corbières, Fribourg, a municipality in the district of Gruyère in the canton of Fribourg == Other == * Conilhac-Corbières, a commune in the Aude department in France * La Corbière, Haute-Saône, a commune in the Haute-Saône department in France * Corbières AOC, a French wine appellation * Corbières Massif, a mountain region in the Occitanie in France
title: Corbières
